name: fast-css-edit
description: Quickly view and edit CSS declarations in a popup by hovering or clicking on className attributes in React files. Boost your workflow with instant style previews!

fast-css-edit.defaultStyleExtension.description: Default extension for the style file to look for or create if no import is found.

fast-css-edit.defaultModuleStyleExtensio.description: Default extension for the CSS module style file to look for or create if no import is found.

fast-css-edit.styleFileNamingConvention.description: Naming convention for the style file when no import is found. Use {componentName} as a placeholder.

fast-css-edit.cssModuleIdentifier.description: The common identifier used when importing CSS Modules (e.g., 'styles' in 'import styles from ...').

fast-css-edit.enableFileCreation.description: Automatically create the style file if it doesn't exist.

fast-css-edit.classNameExtractionRegex.description: (Optional) Advanced Regex to extract class names from className/class attributes. Leave empty for default behavior. Ensure capture groups match expectations if used.

commands.title: Fast CSS Edit: Remove Class and Definition

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
